game.title: The任务
game.synopsis: A dangerous mission requires the player to complete several tasks before advancing. The missions are short, but each one is crucial in order to complete the overall objective.
game.beginning: The mission begins with a small group of enemy soldiers on the city's streets. The player must use their skills and intelligence to gather information and plan an escape.
game.ending: The final mission involves the capture of a key figure in the terrorist organization. The player must work together with other team members to complete the mission successfully.
